item.description: Metro West Humane Society's Annual Craft Fair will take place Saturday Sept. 12 on the Framingham Center Common from 10am-4pm rain or shine. There will be over 70 local venders! Too many to put down on paper. They are a non-profit volunteer organization, located in Ashland, sevicing MetroWest and surrounding areas. They are a no-kill cat shelter. The address is right just ignore the #15. I need an exact address and I don't think the common has one. It is on Edgell Rd. and next to rt. 9 in Framingham center. You can call Sandy at 508-485-4566 or e-mail sbryer@bentley.edu if you have any questions. I will be there at 10am as I have other plans in the afternoon. Hope to see some of you there. This will be hopefully booked on 3 sites!

group.name: WEST OF BOSTON OVER 40 GAY WOMENS MEET-UP

item.name: 3rd Annual Metro West Humane Society
